content.text:
Let me help you solve this block assembly task by breaking it down step by step:

1. Analyzing the Main Target Image:
- Total Blocks: 8 blocks
- Colors: Red (4), Yellow (2), Green (1), Blue (1)
- Layers: 3 layers
- Unique Feature: Some blocks have arch/curved bases

2. Selecting Blocks from Dictionary:
Required Blocks:
- 2x Block 1 (Red arch block)
- 2x Block 11 (Small red triangular top)
- 1x Block 5 (Green cube)
- 1x Block 6 (Yellow cube)
- 1x Block 7 (Yellow rectangular block)
- 1x Block 4 (Blue cube)

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (Red arch block)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (Yellow cube) on top of first block
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (Another Red arch block) next to first block
    Step4: Move block with index 7 (Yellow rectangular block) on top of yellow cube
    Step5: Move block with index 5 (Green cube) inside the arch
    Step6: Move block with index 4 (Blue cube) next to green cube
    Step7: Move block with index 11 (Small red triangular top) on top of right arch block
    Step8: Move block with index 11 (Another small red triangular top) on top of left arch block
}
